ygData.subject: Re: Long Time Listener, First Time Post
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I can tell you that I make most of my money selling standard bow cams.  I ve gotten a few regular customers, and at least once a week I get an order for
ygData.messageBody:
> have had success selling and for how much. I will
> also tell you that it is near impossible to sell
> Standard Bow Cams. The fletching trade is pretty
> much used up and not in demand, thus making our
> Standard Bow Cams not in demand.

I can tell you that I make most of my money selling
standard bow cams. I've gotten a few regular
customers, and at least once a week I get an order for
some. Sometimes it's 4, sometimes it's 8, but it's
consistent. I sell them for 20 each, and it costs me
about 12 to make them. You may call this "gouging"
but I'm still saving them 13 plat per cam (lowest I've
ever seen cams in stores was 33 plat).

Aqualungs... they just piss me off. I made 10 in 24
attempts last night, and spent 5k plat. Raised up 5
points with an INT of 168. That's just sad, 1000 plat
per skill point raise and under 50% success rate,
those numbers are worse than platinum jewel crafting.


All 10 of them were bugged (if you trade them, they
drop to 1 charge). So I have to get the GM to come
fix them everytime I sell them. I think she'll be
bugging the crap out of the development team since she
knows how much I tinker a lot and she'll get tired of
hearing from me =)

Good luck my fellow gnomes, and I hope we're all
praying for diamond dust for Christmas!

Gazamel Prime
Solusek Ro
Master Tinker
